mapper.insert:
insert into course_arrange ( arrange_id, content_id,begin_time,end_time, category,offset) values
(#{item.arrangeId},#{item.contentId},#{item.beginTime} ,#{item.endTime},#{item.category},#{item.offset})
mapper.select: select c.id from student s left join class c on s.class_id = c.id where s.user_id = #{userId}
